properties.name: Atlanta
properties.notes:
Find Mischelle @ Newk's Eatery if you go to Town Brookhaven. See our Facebook page for last minute updates: https://www.facebook.com/PuzzledPintAtlanta

The puzzles and tools to help you solve paperless and remotely will be available at http://www.puzzledpint.com/ by Tuesday morning

There will be no virtual hangout this month.

Be safe, everyone. Wash your hands. Be kind to one another, and puzzle on!

properties.name: Auckland
properties.notes:
Hi folks! Please make sure you have signed your team up at the link below - by Sunday evening 1900. Look forward to catching up with you all again next week!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe5ma5r7MjbwubLOJ1otnK8-J-qnr4Gpb8N-qXRAnk-3uhFHA/viewform

properties.name: Austin
properties.address: 7010 Easy Wind Drive, Suite 150, Austin, TX 78752
properties.notes: Looking forward to seeing y'all!

properties.name: Bangalore
properties.address: 2nd floor, 777/I, 100 Feet Rd, HAL 2nd Stage, , Indiranagar, Bengaluru, KA 560008
properties.notes: Registration link: https://insider.in/event/puzzled-pint-bangalore-march-2023/buy/shows/640ed647d910730008a0e240/Tickets

properties.name: Bay Area - East Bay
properties.address: 4006 Martin Luther King Jr Way, Oakland, CA 94609

properties.name: Bay Area - San Francisco
properties.notes:
San Francisco game control volunteers will be hosting Puzzled Pint at two San Francisco locations again this month. Come puzzle with us at either venue.

The Napper Tandy at 3200 24th Street in the Mission District

Enjoy Irish pub food, drinks, and ambiance along with your puzzles at The Napper Tandy. Now with their winter set up including more heat lamps for the outdoor seats and more seating and lighting in the back room for indoor teams. Look for game control inside by the door to pick up a puzzle set.

OR

Willkommen at 2198 Market Street in Castro/Hayes Valley

Solve your puzzles with us over craft beers and German-American food at the Willkommen beer hall. Features both indoor and outdoor seating, though the outdoor table surface may be somewhat less conducive to puzzling. Consider bringing a good writing surface if you prefer the outdoor option; we'll try to have some on hand to loan. Note that this location closes at 9pm, so we won't be able to stay beyond that.

properties.name: Bay Area - Silicon Valley
properties.notes:
6:30 pm start

We were unable to find a location this month to host us so we're emailing packets! If you have suggestions for locations please email us at puzzledpintsv@gmail.com.

Teams should register for a virtual puzzle set at: https://forms.gle/A13BW2Tx7XL8pM567

properties.name: Bend
properties.notes: Hoping for good weather! If not, we will be inside.

properties.name: Boston
properties.notes:
We have decided to hold this event - unless the MBTA or Time Out Market shut down.
We'll be back at Time Out Market again this month! Please let us know if you plan to attend by Monday evening at https://pp-rsvp.com/XDKP5C

properties.name: Boulder
properties.notes:
PLEASE NOTE: There are multiple Murphy's in Boulder County - we're meeting at the one in Louisville!

Just talk to the host stand for a table, and come pick up puzzles from us at the host table.

properties.name: Brno
properties.notes: Write to Yeti (yeti@physics.muni.cz) if you plan to come. If you want a reservation, make one yourself. Thanks!

properties.name: Cape Town
properties.address: Shop A5, Steenberg Village, Cape Town, WC 7966
properties.notes:
If you can't find us, phone:
Debbie - +27 83 467 8587 or
Bill - +27 82 553 0754

properties.name: Central NJ
properties.bar: Alchemist and Barrister Restaurant and Pub
properties.notes: We're back in Princeton this month! Looking forward to seeing you.

properties.name: Charlottesville
properties.notes:
Matchbox at Stonefield

We're trying out a new spot this month with pizza, burgers, and drinks. You are also welcome to grab the puzzle set from us and go to any of the other restaurants at Stonefield (though it'll be harder for us to give you hints if you do).

As always, please let us know if you like or dislike this month's spot and/or have suggestions for locations for future events.

Please RSVP at puzzledpintcho@gmail.com if you're definitely or probably coming.

properties.name: Chicago - City North
properties.notes:
Note that we're across the street at The Reveler this month - come on out and solve some puzzles!

RSVP at https://pp-rsvp.com/QU64NE

properties.name: Chicago - City South
properties.notes: RSVP here for Marz: https://buytickets.at/puzzledpintchicago/847841

properties.name: Christchurch
properties.notes:
Please book your tables at Fat Eddie's https://www.fateddiesbar.co.nz/book-now and specify you're with Puzzled Pint :)

Thank you!

properties.name: Columbia, Maryland
properties.address: 10035 Baltimore National Pike, Ellicott City, MD 21042
properties.notes:
Can't wait to see you all! Bring your pens and pencils. A highlighter or ruler might be helpful, but no scissors or tape needed this month!

We will also try to monitor Discord for puzzlers hoping to participate virtually.

properties.name: DFW - zzz - Ft. Worth/Arlington
properties.address: 2420 W Park Row Dr, Pantego, TX

properties.name: Denver
properties.notes: See you there!

properties.name: Detroit Metro
properties.address: 601 S Lafayette St, South Lyon, MI 48178
properties.notes: Please make a reservation via witchshatbrewing.com to make sure you get a table right away when you arrive!

properties.name: Edinburgh
properties.notes: As always, please have someone from your group send a quick email to PuzzPintEdi@gmail.com to let us know you're coming, so we can print enough puzzle sets for everyone.

properties.name: Houston
properties.notes: Find us in the indoor bar/restaurant.

properties.name: Huntsville
properties.notes:
Join us at Town Madison's new rooftop gastropub! The bar has live music that night and we will likely be set up on the floor opposite of the band! Look for our sign to find the area to set up in!

For more info, visit us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PuzzPintHSV or Twitter: https://twitter.com/PuzzPintHSV

properties.name: Kansas City
properties.notes: Let the host know you are with Puzzled Pint and the cover fee will be waived. As usual you can look at our facebook page for updates (https://www.facebook.com/puzzledpintkc). See you there!

properties.name: Kitchener-Waterloo
properties.notes:
RSVP to travisandhanna@gmail.com by Monday night so we can give an update to the bar and know how many sets to print!

We'll be upstairs in the Board Room - just let the staff know you're there for Puzzled Pint and they'll direct you to the right spot.

properties.name: London
properties.notes:
At the moment Puzzled Pint London is still running remotely. You're encouraged to join your friends in a video call and solve Puzzled Pint together.

We'll be running the event through our online tool at https://puzzledpint.live/.

You can download the puzzles and check your answers from 7pm on Tuesday

GC will be available to help on request too

properties.name: Los Angeles - Inland Empire
properties.notes: RSVP by Facebook event or email.

properties.name: Los Angeles - Northeast
properties.address: 401 S San Fernando Blvd, Burbank, CA 91502
properties.notes:
There is free underground parking, and there is also street parking.

The restaurant is in the lobby area.

Look for Jake & Stephanie :)

properties.name: Los Angeles - Santa Monica
properties.address: 2455 Santa Monica Blvd, Santa Monica, CA 90404
properties.notes: Hello Santa Monica and west Los Angeles folks! We're back at Vito's this month. Bring your appetite because they've got good pizza in addition to the usual pints. See you from 6-8.

properties.name: Madison
properties.bar: Great Dane Pub & Brewing Co. - Hilldale
properties.notes:
Come celebrate five years of Puzzled Pint in Madison!

RSVPs are optional but appreciated: if you RSVP for your team at gc.madisonpuzzles.com by Tuesday morning, we will be sure to set aside a puzzle set for you. (We will also bring extra sets, so please come even if you haven't RSVP'd!)

properties.name: Manchester
properties.notes:
This month we are at Sandbar Manchester! Just off Oxford Road near Manchester Met Uni.

It's a beautiful independent pub with a great range of drinks, and it's their first time hosting us!

As always - come in a team and start anytime, or come solo before 7.30pm and we will find you a group.

See you there xxx

properties.name: Melbourne
properties.notes:
We are at Henry and the Fox this month! We will either be seated at the back of the main bar area, or in The Den.

Please RSVP so we can confirm numbers for the venue: https://pp-rsvp.com/3K5Q72

Looking forward to seeing you there!

properties.name: Missoula
properties.notes: Join us at Western Cider from 6-9 pm. See you soon!

properties.name: Montreal
properties.address: 20 Duluth Ave E, Montréal, QC H2W 1G6
properties.notes: Please RSVP here if you can: https://www.facebook.com/events/235843792311185

properties.name: Nashville
properties.notes:
We are back in a bar. Come visit, and RSVP to be sure you get a puzzle set. RSVP at https://forms.gle/13xrcZR3EUDQNGiD9

Look for the Puzzled Pint logo on the table near the door.

properties.name: New York City
properties.address: 125 East 15th Street, New York City, NY 10003
properties.notes: Hi all, hope to see you for some pie or puzzling - we should be at the front of the bar, and there is more seating at the back. The bar has asked that each table be on a single check, so please try and faciliatate that as much as possible, thank you!

properties.name: Norwich
properties.notes: Call the pub on 01603 464461 if you want to book a table.

properties.name: Orange County
properties.notes:
This month we'll be meeting at our normal 7:00 pm time at Back Street Brewery in Irvine.
Note that this is attatched to Lamppost Pizza
https://www.lamppostpizzairvineca.com

Please RSVP using this link:
https://pp-rsvp.com/3W4CD6

See you then!

properties.name: Ottawa
properties.notes:
Consider visiting our facebook event and marking yourself as "going" - it helps us know how many puzzles to print!

Kevin and Steph

properties.name: Paducah
properties.notes: Cancelled - sorry for the late notice!

properties.name: Philadelphia
properties.notes: We will be in the Main Dining Room (on the 2nd floor).  There are also outdoor tables (on the mezzanine) if you want to be outside (and the weather is somehow warm).

properties.name: Phoenix
properties.notes:
Bring your favorite puzzle solving friends and tools (pencil, eraser, scissors, straight-edge, or whatever).

Indior and outdoor seating.

See you there!

Happy Pi Day!!!

properties.name: Pittsburgh
properties.notes:
UPDATE: Pittsburgh is CANCELING this month's Puzzled Pint, due to several of the GCs coming down with COVID. We're all fine, just unable to host an event. See you next month!

We're back at Federal Galley again this month. We've been told there will be a school outing here starting at 5:15pm, just eating dinner. We hope that will be wrapped up around 6:15-6:30, but it may be crowded at the start of the event.

properties.name: Portland, Maine
properties.notes: Your GC is out of town!

properties.name: Prague
properties.notes:
The pub does not accept payment cards.

Please fill the RSVP form at https://puzzledpint.sifrovacky.cz/praha.html

properties.name: Raleigh-Durham
properties.notes:
Join us for this month's Puzzled Pint in the Triangle! We'll be in Raleigh this month at Crank Arm Brewing from 6-9pm.

If you plan to attend, please consider marking yourself as "going" on this Facebook event - it helps us know how many puzzle sets to print.

Looking forward to seeing you there!

properties.name: Seattle - City
properties.bar: Pike Brewing Company OR Pine Box
properties.address: 1415 1st Ave OR 1600 Melrose Ave, Seattle, WA
properties.notes:
We're trying two simultaneous events in Seattle again! Pick one:

  • Pike Brewing Company, Downtown at 1415 1st Ave (Apple / Google)
  • The Pine Box, Capitol Hill at 1600 Melrose Ave (Apple / Google)

Please RSVP once per team at Eventbrite as usual, taking care to select tickets for the location you will attend. (One location may fill up sooner, so be sure to check ticket availability.)

RSVP here: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/puzzled-pint-seattle-march-2023-tickets-578294944747

Running two events to accomodate all the happy Seattle puzzlers takes a lot of volunteers! Please talk to us if you're interested in joining the Game Control team.

properties.name: St. Louis
properties.notes: We're back at good old reliable Schlafly Bottleworks in Maplewood. And it's a super fun set. Please rsvp on the facebook event (one rsvp per team) or instead you can rsvp to r_becker@sbcglobal.net (subject: "My team is coming to March Puzzled Pint") This helps us know how many copies to make.

properties.name: Stafford
properties.notes: Come out and do some cool brain teaser puzzles! It's family friendly though the puzzles can be hard (we are there to help!)

properties.name: Sydney
properties.notes:
As you enter the venue walk straight ahead and down the stairs, we have reserved the whole room at the very back of the venue all for us!

Please bring your own stationery if possible, however we will have things to lend out!

Please like and share our facebook page and please leave us a review!

properties.name: Syracuse
properties.notes: UPDATE 2023-03-14 - Due to the inclement weather, I am going to cancel tonight's event. Please stay safe at home and send me an email at puzzledpintsyracuse@gmail.com if you would like the puzzles tonight! They will be made available on puzzledpint.com tomorrow morning.

properties.name: Toronto
properties.notes:
Looking forward to seeing everyone this Tuesday, March 14, 2023.

We will be set up at our GC table to help with the puzzles from 6:00 - 9:00 PM

Please join us in the Discord between events for other puzzle-related fun!

Puzzled Pint Toronto is currently overseen by: Michaela and Stu at the GC table and Andria for venue booking and social media

properties.name: Tulsa
properties.notes: We can't wait to see you at Heirloom Rustic Ales from 6:00-9:00! They will probably not have a food truck there that night, but you can bring food with you. They are kid-friendly and have a pet-friendly patio (leashes required). -Cassie and Alex

properties.name: Twin Cities
properties.notes:
All you puzzle mages 🧙🏽, this month we'll be visiting Merlin's Rest 🧙‍♂️! When you arrive, please let the staff know you are with Puzzled Pint. They will bring you to tables reserved for us in the back.

Merlin's is a neighborhood place, so there will be street parking for cars and bikes. Avoid the parking lot with signs that say "Absolutely no pub parking." The 9 and 21 buses are good options too.

So we can print and reserve a puzzle set for your group, we need you to RSVP. Please do that here: https://pp-rsvp.com/7KRQ5E

See you soon! ✨

properties.name: Valencia
properties.address: Carrer del Dr. Ferran, 10, Valencia, V 46021
properties.notes:
Join the group on Telegram to stay up to date: https://t.me/puzzledpintvlc

Arrive by 2030 if you want to be placed in a team or arrive at any time before 2130 if you have your own team. We will be there until midnight. The puzzles usually take our teams around 2 hours to complete. Not a problem to come alone, you can complete the puzzles solo or we can help you find a team if you would like one. Ask for the Puzzled Pint and/or the Board Games group. We will occupy both 'sides' of the bar.

properties.name: Victoria
properties.notes:
Back to the Moon Under Water - please RSVP per team via chris@engimaticevents.com.

We will have one side of the bar reserved for us until about 7.15. Look for the Yellow table sign for the puzzle packs!

properties.name: Washington - Arlington/City
properties.notes: Washington DC-City/Arlington will be back once again at Spider Kelly's in Clarendon. If you are planning to attend, please RSVP to puzzledpintdc@gmail.com so we know how many teams to expect and sets to print.

properties.name: Wellington
properties.notes:
This month we are back at Mac's Brew Bar on the waterfront.
Please remember to hit going on the facebook event https://www.facebook.com/events/1616520325440802 and remind your teammates to do the same. Last month we heavily over-printed and wasting paper makes me sad.

No special stationery required, just pen, pencil, maybe a highlighter, but as usual we'll have spares you can borrow :)

properties.name: Zurich
properties.notes: This month we're at The Alehouse – Palmhof just up the road from ETH Zentrum (nearest tram stop is ETH/Universitätsspital). See you there!

properties.name: zzz - Burlington
properties.notes: Congrats on solving the location puzzle! We can't wait to see you this month at a new location for us - Pizza 44! Check out our FB page if you have any questions or for updates, see you soon!
